de.spricom.dessert.slicing

Class AbstractRootSlice

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.spricom.dessert.slicing.AbstractSlice
      • de.spricom.dessert.slicing.AbstractRootSlice
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Slice
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Classpath, Root

    public abstract class AbstractRootSlice
extends AbstractSlice
    Defines some convenience methods for Classpath and Root.

      • getClazzes

        public Set<Clazz> getClazzes()
        Description copied from interface: Slice
        Returns all classes belonging to this slice. This is only possible for slices based on the Classpath. A slice derived from some pattern or Predicate will throw a ResolveException instead.
        Returns:
        a set of all classes belonging to this slice
